IntroductionÂ¶

This project started with the need for comparing promoter recognition programs in the literature.

So far we have implemented 3 models, with more in progress.

The models include:

  • CNNPROM, DOI: 10.1371/journal.pone.0171410

  • ICNN, DOI: 10.1109/COMPSAC.2018.00072

  • DPROM, DOI: 10.3389/fgene.2019.00286

We have also created a way to test the models in a unified manner that mimics a realistic scenario.

All of this has been outlined in more detail in my thesis

Deep Learning Promoter Recognition Testing
